Text:
I have an Activity which has a database query and it brings 300 records from the query, now I move to another activity and make changes in the same database, now when i return back to the first Activity and Refresh the Database by making the Same query i get 600 records.

Can anyone please suggest where am i going wrong.

I have an activity which has a database query and it brings back 300 records from the query.  Now I move to another activity and make changes in the same database.  Now when I return back to the first activity and refresh the database by making the _same_ query, I get 600 records.

Can anyone please suggest where I am going wrong?
